CustomField.description: Field to be used as an extension to Filter Criteria. Contents of this field will be concatenated to the content of "Filter Criteria" without any validation while evaluating.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field to be used as an extension to Filter Criteria. Contents of this field will be concatenated to the content of "Filter Criteria" without any validation while evaluating.
CustomField.label: Filter Criteria 2
